block.p: LEAD: Come Quilt With Me Inc., a quilting-supply mail-order business, and the 92d Street Y are sponsoring their ninth annual quilting bee at the Y on Sunday from 1 to 5 P.M. There will also be talks on quilting in America and Japan throughout the afternoon. Admission is $5, and quilts may be appraised by the quilter Genie Barnes for $20.

LEAD: Come Quilt With Me Inc., a quilting-supply mail-order business, and the 92d Street Y are sponsoring their ninth annual quilting bee at the Y on Sunday from 1 to 5 P.M. There will also be talks on quilting in America and Japan throughout the afternoon. Admission is $5, and quilts may be appraised by the quilter Genie Barnes for $20.

Come Quilt With Me Inc., a quilting-supply mail-order business, and the 92d Street Y are sponsoring their ninth annual quilting bee at the Y on Sunday from 1 to 5 P.M. There will also be talks on quilting in America and Japan throughout the afternoon. Admission is $5, and quilts may be appraised by the quilter Genie Barnes for $20. The Y is at 1395 Lexington Avenue. Information: (718) 377-3652.
